AWG¶

AWGDevices¶

Created on Jul 2, 2015

@author: Geoffrey Ji

AWG Devices are defined here. If a new AWG needs to be added, it must inherit AWGDevice and implement open, program, and close.

class AWGDevice(name, config, globalDict, waveform, parent=None)[source]¶

The AWG does not fit into the external parameter framework, but given a waveform, the variables can act as external parameters. This class wraps a waveform into an external parameter-based device.
